{{html:
 <h1 data-bind="text: selectedBucket().name"></h1>

 <div class="widget big-stats-container stacked">
<div class="widget-content">
<div id="big_stats" class="cf">

    <div class="stat" data-bind="text: selectedBucket().status">
    </div>
    <div class="stat" data-bind="text: selectedBucket().plan">
    </div>
    <div class="stat" data-bind="text: selectedBucket().region">
    </div>
    <div class="stat" data-bind="text: selectedBucket().imageName">
    </div>


   
  </div>
    </div>
	  </div>
	  <div class="tabbable">
    <ul class="nav nav-tabs">
        <li class="active">
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#power">Power</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Plan">Plan</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Snapshots">Snapshots</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Backups">Backups</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Settings">Settings</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Monitoring">Monitoring</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Destroy">Destroy</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#History">History</a>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <div class="tab-content">
    <div id="power" class="tab-pane active">
    <h3>Power control</h3>
    <input class="btn btn-info btn-large " data-bind="click: selectedBucket().powerOffBucket, visible: selectedBucket().status() == 'active'" type="submit" value="Power Off"/>
    <input  class="btn btn-info btn-large " data-bind="click: selectedBucket().bootBucket, visible: selectedBucket().status() != 'active'" type="submit" value="Boot"/>
  </div>

    <div id="Plan" class="control-group tab-pane">
    <h3>Choose your Plan</h3>
	<div class="controls shortcuts"> 
    {{include:plan_list}}
	</div>
	<br><br><br>
    <input class="btn btn-info btn-large " type="submit" value="Resize" data-bind="click: selectedBucket().resize" />
  </div>
    <div id="Snapshots" class="tab-pane">
    <h3>Manage & create Snapshots</h3>
    <h4>Take a Snapshot</h4>
    <div  data-bind="visible: selectedBucket().status() == 'off'">
      Snapshot name: <input class="input-large"  data-bind='value: newSnapshot().name, valueUpdate: "afterkeydown"' type="text"  placeholder="Snapshot Name"/>
      <input class="btn btn-info btn-large"  type="submit" value="Create snapshot" data-bind="click: saveSnapshot" />
    </div>
    <div data-bind="visible: selectedBucket().status() == 'active'">
      You must turn it off before creating snapshot
    </div>
	<hr>
    <h4>Restore from Snapshot</h4>

	<table class="table table-bordered table-striped">
	<thead>
	<tr><th>Select</th><th>Name</th></tr>
	</thead>
	<tbody  data-bind="foreach: snapshots">
    <tr>
      <td><input type="radio" name="snapshot" /></td ><td width="89%"  data-bind="text: name"></td>
    </tr>
	</tbody>
	</table>

    <input class="btn btn-info btn-large"  type="submit" value="Restore" data-bind="click: rollbackSnapshot" />
  </div>
    <div id="Backups" class="tab-pane">
    <h3>Backups</h3>
    <h4>Coming soon...</h4>

  </div>
    <div id="Settings" class="control-group tab-pane">
    <h3>Settings</h3>
    <h4>Image</h4>
	<div class="controls shortcuts"> 
    {{include:image_list}}
    <input class="btn btn-info btn-large"   type="submit" value="Change image" onclick="reload()" />
	</div>
	<br>
	<br>
	<hr>
    <h4>Rename</h4>
    New name: <input  class="input-large" data-bind='value: selectedBucket().name, valueUpdate: "afterkeydown"' type="text"  placeholder="New Name"/>
    <input class="btn btn-info btn-large"   type="submit" value="Change name" data-bind="click: saveAllBuckets" />

  </div>
  <div id="Monitoring" class="tab-pane">
    <h3>Monitoring</h3>
    <p>
      CPU Utilization
}}

    </p>
  </div>
    <div id="Destroy" class="tab-pane">
    <h3>Destroy</h3>
	<p>warning message goes here warning message goes here warning message goes here</p>
	<hr>
    <input class="btn btn-danger btn-large"  data-bind="click: selectedBucket().destroy" data-confirm="Are you sure you want to destroy this droplet?" name="commit" type="submit" value="Destroy"></input>
  </div>
    <div id="History" class="tab-pane">
    <h3>History</h3>
    <table  class="table table-bordered table-striped" data-bind="visible: selectedBucket().history().length > 0">
  <thead>
   <tr>
    <th>
     Event
    </th>
    <th>
     Initiated
    </th>
    <th>
     Execution Time
    </th>
   </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody data-bind="foreach: selectedBucket().history">
   <tr>
    <td data-bind="text: event">
    </td>
    <td data-bind="text: initiated">
    </td>
    <td data-bind="text: execution">
    </td>
   </tr>
  </tbody>
 </table>
  </div>
</div>
</div>
